TopicTitle: VAB and SPH Part Search Bar

Articles.Content: This helps especially if you have a lot of mods. Basically, instead of scrolling through all the tabs which takes forever, there is just a search bar to look up the part you need.

I've though of this myself a couple of times. Yes, there needs to be a better way to search for parts. I think that a part subcategorization system is also planned, so that there will be subcategories under the main categories (e.g. under propulsion there would be an 'engines' tab).
Yea, I already mentioned that in other topic. Search would be really helpful as the way they got items organized right now is rather confusing for a newcommers.
